name: Blocklight
description:
Are you ready to light a way through this immense stiff circuit?

The assumption is far ahead different than the reality when it comes to the actual gameplay.
Vanguard this black little pellet through different levels, avoiding the stumbling obstacles and spikes. Don’t get trap in this miscellaneous world.

▪ FEATURES:
• Over 50 levels - quite impossible to play
• Instant Calm music and scenes
• Another example of quick hard gameplay
• Can skip level if unable to clear the level
• Can compete and challenge through leaderboard

▪ HOW TO PLAY:
• Press to move
• Avoid the white obstacles
